Header: Lecture on ‘Suicide Prevention & Problem-Solving’ Goes to Battalion Trg School
Content: Troops under training at  the Battalion Training School in Arasapurakulam of 66 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi were recently  enlightened on ‘Suicide Prevention and Problem-Solving' in a psychological programme’ organized by the Army Directorate of Preventive Medicine and Mental Health at the Colombo Army Hospital, together with members of the Directorate of Psychological Operations. 200 troops from different establishments in the 66 Division attended the lectures in Arsapurakulam. General Officer Commanding 66 Division, Brigadier Mangala Wijesundara and Several senior Officers were also associated with the arrangement.
